ValidationRule.description: If a Scale opportunity record is in declined, Closed/Lost, or Could Not Compete, reason can't be blank.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.Name = "Scale", OR( ISPICKVAL (StageName , "Declined"), ISPICKVAL (StageName , "Could Not Compete"), ISPICKVAL (StageName , "Closed Lost") ), ISBLANK(TEXT(Reason__c)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Field Required: Reason Field must be filled out for Declined, Could Not Compete, and Closed Lost.
